leave policy: Employees are entitled to 20 days of paid leave per year. Sick leave requires a doctor's note after 3 days.
benefits: Our benefits package includes health insurance, retirement plans, and annual performance bonuses.
onboarding: New hires go through a 2-week onboarding process including orientation and training sessions.
work hours: Standard work hours are 9 AM to 5 PM with flexible options available upon manager approval.
promotions: Promotions are considered annually based on performance reviews and manager recommendations.
resignation: Employees must submit a formal resignation with a notice period of at least two weeks.
training: Employees receive continuous training opportunities both online and on-site.
attendance: Attendance is monitored through a digital system. Repeated lateness is addressed by HR.
overtime: Overtime must be pre-approved and is compensated according to labor law.
performance reviews: Reviews are conducted bi-annually to assess employee goals and achievements.
